songs.title: Revolution (Demo)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm a poet
You're a thief
Welcome to my side
Of the street
Drink my wine
Free the beast
We're all fighters

[Chorus]
In the revolution
It's calling out our names
It's a constitution
And our struggle's all the same
Who can you blame
The revolution

[Verse 2]
It's our job
We have no choice
Chain the system
Use your voice
Don't look back, no regrets
Strap your boots on

[Chorus]
It's a revolution
And it's calling out your names
In the constitution
Our struggle's all the same
Who can you blame?
The revolution

[Verse 3]
Ain't no stopping
Us today
Better watch out
You're in the way
We're the children
Of the future
Haven't you heard

[Chorus]
About the revolution
And it's calling out your names
In the constitution
And our struggle's all the same
Who can you blame
The revolution

[Verse 3 Reprise]
Ain't no stopping
Us today
Better watch out
You're in the way
We're the children
Of the future
Haven't you heard
About the revolution
